resources.string:
einsteini.ai uses the Android Accessibility service to process your text and provide you with writing suggestions. To provide you with an optimized product, we also process some additional information, such as the type of device you're using. We don't and will not sell your data.

einsteini.ai uses the following Accessibility capabilities:

Retrieve your typed text:
This is required for einsteini.ai to provide writing suggestions in supported apps.

Detect window changed:
This is required to turn einsteini.ai on or off when you're typing in apps.

Enabling the shortcut toggle on this screen is NOT required.
Provides AI assistance directly within LinkedIn to help you create better content.
Required to show the AI assistant overlay when you need help with creating content.
Required to understand LinkedIn context to provide relevant AI suggestions.

einsteini.ai uses the Android Accessibility service to process LinkedIn content and provide you with AI-powered writing suggestions. To provide you with an optimized product, we also access some additional information, such as the type of content you\'re viewing. We don\'t and will not sell your data.
einsteini.ai uses the following Accessibility capabilities:
This is required for einsteini.ai to provide intelligent content suggestions for LinkedIn posts and comments.
This is required to turn einsteini.ai on or off when you\'re browsing different sections of LinkedIn.
Enabling the shortcut toggle in accessibility settings is NOT required.
